snippet: Making it plain that job creation had become its focus, the Federal Reserve said it would suppress interest rates so long as unemployment stayed above a certain level.
abstract: Federal Reserve, making it plain that job creation has become its primary focus, says it plans to continue suppressing interest rates so long as unemployment rate remains above 6.5 percent; is first time that the nation's central bank has publicized such a specific economic objective, underscoring its concern over nation's jobless rate.
lead_paragraph: Making it plain that job creation had become its focus, the Federal Reserve said it would suppress interest rates so long as unemployment stayed above a certain level.

headline.main: Fed Ties Rates to Joblessness, With Target of 6.5%
headline.print_headline: Fed Ties Rates To Joblessness; 6.5% Is Target
